data.title: Automated Data Processing
data.description: Centralize and automate how you administrate benefit and reward-related processes from onboarding to distributing data to local insurers, carriers and payrolls.

data.title: Immersive Global Experience
data.description: Awesome HR creates an immersive and globally consistent experience by providing unique, personal, mobile and local benefit and rewards enablement to every employee.

data.title: Management of Benefit Costs
data.description: Immediately visualize and report your total employee offer and benefits enrollment in each country you operate in and make better, smarter and faster decisions.
